Class MainApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • MainApp

  • public class MainApp
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main class of the Hardware Store database manager. It provides a console for a user to use the 5 main commands.
    Author:
    Trenton Hohle

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MainApp()
      Default constructor.

      This method will add items quantity with given number.

      This method will add a user (customer or employee) to the system.

      This method will edit a user (customer or employee).
      void finishTransaction()
      This method will lead user to complete a transaction.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      This method will begin the user interface console.
      void removeItem()
      This method will remove the item with given ID.
      void saveDatabase()
      These method is called to save the database before exit the system.
      void searchItemByName()
      This method can search item by a given name (part of name.
      void showAllItems()
      This method shows all items in the inventory.
      void showAllTransactions()

    • Method Detail

      • addItemQuantity

        public void addItemQuantity()
        This method will add items quantity with given number. If the item does not exist, it will call another method to add it.

      • addUser

        public void addUser()
        This method will add a user (customer or employee) to the system.

      • editUser

        public void editUser()
        This method will edit a user (customer or employee).

      • finishTransaction

        public void finishTransaction()
        This method will lead user to complete a transaction.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        This method will begin the user interface console. Main uses a loop to continue executing commands until the user types '6'.
        Parameters:
        args - this program expects no command line arguments
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • removeItem

        public void removeItem()
        This method will remove the item with given ID. If the item does not exist, it will show an appropriate message.

      • saveDatabase

        public void saveDatabase()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        These method is called to save the database before exit the system.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • searchItemByName

        public void searchItemByName()
        This method can search item by a given name (part of name. Case-insensitive.) Will display all items with the given name.

      • showAllItems

        public void showAllItems()
        This method shows all items in the inventory.

      • showAllTransactions

        public void showAllTransactions()

      • showAllUsers

        public void showAllUsers()
        This method shows all users in the system.
